## Vascular tissues in leaves are confined to veins
<hr>
<br/>

<div style="float: right; width: 65%;">
* **<span style="color:darkgreen">_Transpiration_ (leaf water loss from evaporation)</span> is a by‐product of opened stomatal pores**
<br/>

* **H~2~O transport needs to be sufficient to keep stomata open** 
<br/>

* **Veins represents investment in H~2~O supply**
</div>

<IMG STYLE="position:absolute; TOP:250px; LEFT:80px; WIDTH:250px; HEIGHT:350px" SRC="images/leafveins.jpg">

<IMG STYLE="position:absolute; TOP:350px; LEFT:395px; WIDTH:600px; HEIGHT:300px" SRC="images/venation.jpg">

<hr>

## Photosynthesis is the basis for most biomass on Earth
<hr>
<br/>
<br/>
<br/>

<div style="float: left; width: 45%;">

* **Greek = “building with light”**
* **Autotroph = “self nourishing”**
* **Photoautotroph = “self nourishing with light”**

<br/>

* **Photosynthesis is an energy pathway**
    + 2 linked reactions
    + light-dependent reaction + Calvin cycle
    + light reaction makes chemical products for use in the Calvin cycle

 </div>
 
<IMG STYLE="position:absolute; TOP:225px; LEFT:500px; WIDTH:550px; HEIGHT:400px" SRC="images/reactions.jpg">

## The nature of light
<hr>
<br/>
<br/>
<br/>

<div style="float: left; width: 45%;">

* **Light is a form of energy, characterized by wavelengths**

<br/>

* **Short wavelengths have more energy than long wavelengths**

<br/>

* **Sunlight includes wavelengths in the visible spectrum,  UV, and infrared**
    + UV is too powerful and infrared to weak for photosynthesis

 </div>

<IMG STYLE="position:absolute; TOP:190px; LEFT:500px; WIDTH:500px; HEIGHT:500px" SRC="images/light_spectrum.jpg">
